High Priest Orven:

We have to prepare to the rite properly.

Go to the Dragon Valley and kill 1000 monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Dragontroop Soldier, Dragontroop Lancer, Dragontroop Berserker, Dragontroop Minion, Dragontroop Wizard, Dragontroop Elite Wizard, Drake Minion, Mutated Drake.

Come back after dealing with monsters.
